body_html:
@skye Why not? Many of your upstream updates comes from your internal branch that merge more or less regularly here on the public available repository.
Tagging "community" issue/pr on a target release could be useful to have a tentative effort. I.e. this is working for Kubernetes as a general reference.

body:
@skye Why not? Many of your upstream updates comes from your internal branch that merge more or less regularly here on the public available repository. 
Tagging "community" issue/pr on a target release could be useful to have a tentative effort. I.e. this is working for Kubernetes as a general reference.
